title: Mission s bug
body: I played a game of ranked and i have a mission to play 9 ranked games (solo/duo) and when i ended a solo duo game it didn t add in a mission and now in missions i have 5 games to win and on a profile it sas i need to play 4 more games.BTW report a bug button doesen t work....Please Riot help

replies.body:
I think this might be some kind of visual bug, because it doesn't seem like the mission is active on our end. Is it possible you already completed the first win mission today?

If you don't mind, please submit a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our game teams can look into this further and make sure everything is working correctly!
